history.proof: intros d. induction d using DTA_ind. simpl. unfold dta_non_empty_states_lazy. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad Unable to unify "dta_states_non_empty (dta p a)" with "dta_states_non_empty_lazy (dta p a)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : DTA, dta_states_non_empty_lazy d = dta_states_non_empty d

Premises:
dta_states_non_empty_lazy = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => dta_non_empty_states_lazy p end : DTA -> Map bool
dta_states_non_empty = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => dta_non_empty_states p end : DTA -> Map bool
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
signature.dta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature.signature), signature.dta_compat_check d sigma = true -> signature.dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
signature.predta_compat_check_complete : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature.signature), signature.predta_compat_check d sigma = true -> signature.predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma
signature.dta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : DTA) (sigma : signature.signature), signature.dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> signature.dta_compat_check d sigma = true
signature.predta_compat_check_correct : forall (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature.signature), signature.predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> signature.predta_compat_check d sigma = true
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
signature.predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature.signature) (d d' : preDTA), signature.predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> signature.predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> signature.predta_compatible d d'
signature.dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature.signature) (d d' : DTA), signature.dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> signature.dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> signature.dta_compatible d d'
eqm_bool = fix eqm_bool (x y : Map bool) {struct y} : bool := match x with | @M0 _ => match y with | @M0 _ => true | _ => false end | @M1 _ a b => match y with | @M1 _ c d => (a =? c)%N && eq_bool b d | _ => false end | @M2 _ a b => match y with | @M2 _ c d => eqm_bool a c && eqm_bool b d | _ => false end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> bool
signature.predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature.signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> signature.state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature.signature -> Prop
dta_app_ne = fun (d : preDTA) (m : Map bool) => dta_app_ne_aux d m m : preDTA -> Map bool -> Map bool
dta_non_empty_states_lazy = fun d : preDTA => lazy_power bool eqm_bool (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
dta_non_empty_states = fun d : preDTA => power (Map bool) (dta_app_ne d) (map_mini state d) (S (MapCard state d)) : preDTA -> Map bool
rec_term = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d stp tl k end | prec_empty => match l with | tnil => true | tcons _ _ => false end end end for rec_term : preDTA -> ad -> term -> nat -> bool Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope]
signature.dta_compat_check = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature.signature) => match d with | dta p _ => signature.predta_compat_check p sigma end : DTA -> signature.signature -> bool
signature.dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature.signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => signature.predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature.signature -> Prop
reconnait = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end : DTA -> term -> Prop
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
signature.dta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : DTA, signature.dta_compatible d0 d1 -> signature.DTA_compat d0 d1
lem = fix lem (m0 m1 : Map bool) {struct m1} : Prop := match m0 with | @M0 _ => match m1 with | @M0 _ => True | _ => False end | @M1 _ a b => match m1 with | @M1 _ a' b' => if (a =? a')%N then leb b b' else False | _ => False end | @M2 _ a b => match m1 with | @M2 _ c d => lem a c /\ lem b d | _ => False end end : Map bool -> Map bool -> Prop
signature.predta_compat_check = fix predta_compat_check (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature.signature) {struct d} : bool := match d with | @M0 _ => true | @M1 _ _ s => signature.st_compat_check s sigma | @M2 _ x y => predta_compat_check x sigma && predta_compat_check y sigma end : preDTA -> signature.signature -> bool
dta_app_ne_aux = fix dta_app_ne_aux (d : preDTA) (m r : Map bool) {struct r} : Map bool := match d with | @M0 _ => M0 bool | @M1 _ a s => match r with | @M1 _ a' b => if (a =? a')%N then M1 bool a (b || st_non_empty m s) else M0 bool | _ => M0 bool end | @M2 _ d0 d1 => match r with | @M2 _ r0 r1 => M2 bool (dta_app_ne_aux d0 m r0) (dta_app_ne_aux d1 m r1) | _ => M0 bool end end : preDTA -> Map bool -> Map bool -> Map bool
MapRemove_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall a : ad, mapcanon A (MapRemove A m a)
MapPut_behind_as_Merge_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut_behind A m a y = MapMerge A (M1 A a y) m
MapPut_as_Merge_c : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapPut A m a y = MapMerge A m (M1 A a y)
MapPut_behind_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (MapPut_behind A m a y)
MapPut_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (MapPut A m a y)
lattice_bounded_3 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_0 (concat bool p m)
lattice_bounded_2 : forall p : prechain bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 p -> forall m : Map bool, lattice_bounded_def_1 (concat bool p m)
prechain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall m : Map A, P (single A m)) -> (forall p : prechain A, P p -> forall m : Map A, P (concat A p m)) -> forall p : prechain A, P p
MapRemove_as_RestrBy_c : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall (a : ad) (y : B), MapRemove A m a = MapDomRestrBy A B m (M1 B a y)
N_ind : forall P : N -> Prop, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
MapDomRestrTo_canon : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall m' : Map B, mapcanon A (MapDomRestrTo A B m m')
MapDomRestrBy_canon : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall m' : Map B, mapcanon A (MapDomRestrBy A B m m')
N.eqb_refl : forall x : N, (x =? x)%N = true
equal_eq_bool : forall b : bool, eq_bool b b = true
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m

```  
intros d.
induction d using DTA_ind.
- reflexivity.
- simpl. unfold dta_states_non_empty_lazy. unfold dta_non_empty_states_lazy. rewrite <- IHd. reflexivity.

original: intros d. induction d using DTA_ind. - reflexivity. - simpl. unfold dta_states_non_empty_lazy. unfold dta_non_empty_states_lazy. rewrite <- IHd. reflexivity.
